channel.title: Where can i get a database?
channel.description: Alright, well im setting up a RSPS CMS and it needs a database.. where can i find that?

Same difference i guess, just different preferences. At least OP has a lot of choices now lol

item.source: Where can i get a database?

item.title: Where can i get a database?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“XxAndyxX, post:9, topic:437512”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=540218.msg3956008#msg3956008 date=1332759304]

Alright, well im setting up a RSPS CMS and it needs a database… where can i find that?

you can get a book on MySQL at the library, its easy to learn and you’ll be a pro in less than month.

those post saying Wamp or Xamp all that means is the download to install apache/MySQL/fileZilla to your computer.

The best way you can learn is by ordering them here http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=mysql&x=0&y=0 I learned this way, I hope this helps you out!

You can get this stuff for free all over the internet…
[/quote]

You can’t get a physical book anywhere over the internet. you can get an ebook on http://thepiratebay.se/search/mysql/0/99/0 but thats not the point mate… anyone can watch tut’s on even just youtube… Having a physical book in-front of you with challenges and chapters cannot be gotten online… IT CAN be found at your local library free as i posted before.[/quote]

Yes. Or you can just download several text files from the internet which will tell you everything about MySQL, that’s how I done it.

Read full topic

you can get a book on MySQL at the library, its easy to learn and you’ll be a pro in less than month.

those post saying Wamp or Xamp all that means is the download to install apache/MySQL/fileZilla to your computer.

The best way you can learn is by ordering them here http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_1?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=mysql&x=0&y=0 I learned this way, I hope this helps you out!
[/quote]

You can get this stuff for free all over the internet…[/quote]

You can’t get a physical book anywhere over the internet. you can get an ebook on http://thepiratebay.se/search/mysql/0/99/0 but thats not the point mate… anyone can watch tut’s on even just youtube… Having a physical book in-front of you with challenges and chapters cannot be gotten online… IT CAN be found at your local library free as i posted before.
